column8: 2 times a week during rainy season, 2 weeks after fertilization then weekly
Weekly after key events and biweekly during the off season

column38: Maize and common beans were grown in rotation from 2003 to 2011, followed by sunflower for 2 years until the establishment of this study in November 2015. Local farmers generally burn the crop residues during the dry season, and commonly tilled the field prior to seeding.
